data.title: Sarianne Cormier
data.meta_description: For many years, Sarianne has been standing out as much in front of the camera than behind it.On film, she was directed by Podz (L'Affaire Dumont and Miraculum), François Delisle (Chorus), Ryan Mckenna (Le cœur de Madame Sabali and Promenade Nocturne), Guillaume Lambert (Les Scènes Fortuites), Jonathan Beaulieu-Cyr and Renaud Lessard (Mad Dog Labine) and Matthew Rankin (The 20th Century and Une Langue Universelle). On the small screen, she played, among others, Laura in 19-2, Chloé in Mémoires vives and Myriam Monty in Audrey est revenue.On stage, she often collaborates with Hugo Bélanger, Mireille Camier and Mathieu Quesnel. Taking on the charge of writer and director, her last creation Mythologie was presented at the Petite Licorne in Septembre 2021. Her company is currently in residency at the Théâtre la Licorne for a cycle of 2 years.As a director, Sarianne signed a few short films: Les Vestiges (2013), La Volupté (2015), Amour Amour (2017) and Les Années lumière (2017). She presently works on the production of her first feature-length film, Au Revoir Pluton.As a script-writer, she co-wrote the series Bon Matin Chuck (2023) and is currently focusing on her next film Le Chant du Cygne.
data.text:
For many years, Sarianne has been standing out as much in front of the camera than behind it.

On film, she was directed by Podz (L'Affaire Dumont and Miraculum), François Delisle (Chorus), Ryan Mckenna (Le cœur de Madame Sabali and Promenade Nocturne), Guillaume Lambert (Les Scènes Fortuites), Jonathan Beaulieu-Cyr and Renaud Lessard (Mad Dog Labine) and Matthew Rankin (The 20th Century and Une Langue Universelle). On the small screen, she played, among others, Laura in 19-2, Chloé in Mémoires vives and Myriam Monty in Audrey est revenue.

On stage, she often collaborates with Hugo Bélanger, Mireille Camier and Mathieu Quesnel. Taking on the charge of writer and director, her last creation Mythologie was presented at the Petite Licorne in Septembre 2021. Her company is currently in residency at the Théâtre la Licorne for a cycle of 2 years.

As a director, Sarianne signed a few short films: Les Vestiges (2013), La Volupté (2015), Amour Amour (2017) and Les Années lumière (2017). She presently works on the production of her first feature-length film, Au Revoir Pluton.

As a script-writer, she co-wrote the series Bon Matin Chuck (2023) and is currently focusing on her next film Le Chant du Cygne.
